How many people are affected by Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome ?,Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome is a rare disorder. Its exact prevalence is unknown.,GHR,Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome ?,"Mutations in the TREX1, RNASEH2A, RNASEH2B, RNASEH2C, and SAMHD1 genes have been identified in people with Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome.  The TREX1, RNASEH2A, RNASEH2B, and RNASEH
